attributes.action: Say no to a second national lockdown because of Covid19.
attributes.additional_details: By doing so it bring worse results for the country and the people. More people will die as a result of a lockdown than those that die of the virus, and the economy will be even more damaged.
attributes.background: To decide not to lock the country down for a second time.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/549862
